welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cantu, Italy! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and experience all that Cantu has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a login or registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
